DOC.brief_summary: Enrolled subject receive one bilateral Ulthera® treatment knee . Up 30 subject enrol . Study photo obtain prior study treatment , immediately follow study treatment , post-treatment follow-up visit . Follow-up visit occur 90 180 day post-treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study : Evaluation Ulthera® System Treatment Knees
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study prospective , single-center clinical trial Ulthera® System treat skin laxity knee . Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale score Patient Satisfaction questionnaire obtain follow-up visit .
DOC.criteria: Female , age 30 65 year . Subject good health . Mild moderate skin laxity around knee . Understands accepts obligation undergo procedure area treat followup period . Presence active systemic local skin disease may affect wound healing . Excessive subcutaneous fat around knee . Excessive skin laxity around knee .
